content: विज्ञानं {@--1@} Knowledge, wisdom, intelligence, understanding; <ls>Pt. 1. 24</ls>; <ls n="Pt.">5. 3</ls>; विज्ञानमयः कोशः ‘the sheath of intelligence’ (the first of the five sheaths of the soul). {@--2@} Discrimination, discernment. {@--3@} Skill, proficiency; प्रयोगविज्ञानं <ls>Ś. 1. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Worldly or profane knowledge, knowledge derived from worldly experience (<ab>opp.</ab> ज्ञान which is ‘knowledge of Brahma or Supreme Spirit’); ज्ञानं तेहं सविज्ञानमिदं वक्ष्याम्यशेषतः <ls>Bg. 7. 2</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">3. 41</ls>; (the whole of the 7th Adhyāya of <ls>Bg.</ls> explains ज्ञान and विज्ञान). {@--5@} Business, employment. {@--6@} Music. {@--7@} Knowledge of the fourteen lores.
